CustomField.description: The NPSP automatically checks for the presence of custom fiscal years, and disabled FY settings if they're found to avoid errors. This setting overrides that safety-check for users who have accidentally enabled custom fiscal years.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The NPSP automatically checks for the presence of custom fiscal years, and disabled FY settings if they're found to avoid errors. This setting overrides that safety-check for users who have accidentally enabled custom fiscal years.
CustomField.label: Force Fiscal Year
